short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An open source extension providing the current exchange rate for Bitcoin.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This simple Chrome extension gives you the real time exchange rate of Bitcoin in USD.

Currently in early alpha.  Additional currencies and features to come.

Here's the source:
https://github.com/cilphex/bitcoin-price-extension
